verbose_text: Salmonella SPI-1 effectors SopB, SopE, SopE2, and SipA each play various roles in inducing ruffling and bacterial uptake by changing the localization and expression of ZO-1 and occludin, although SipA and SopB alone are not sufficient for this process.
evidence: SipA each play various roles in inducing ruffling and bacterial uptake by changing the localization and expression of ZO-1
